channel.title: Exchaning Pk Points for Items

item.title: Exchaning Pk Points for Items
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

Ok i have no idea how to set this up so i thought i could make it, so you exchange the points for an item personally not through a shop basically what i mean

talk to santa he says “would you like to trade 500 pk points for a AGS?”

how would the code for that work? something like this?

[code] case 127:
talk(“would you like to trade 500 pk points for a AGS?”, 1552);
break;
case 128:
choice(“Yes.”, “No.”);
break;
case 129:
talk(“Ok Enjoy Your Item”, 1552);
deleteItem(???, 1);
addItem(35, 1);
break;[code]
now im sure thats wrong lol, and the “???” is supose to somehow be the Pk Points but idk how, and will this even work lol cuz i dont want a shop for it unless i really have to…

Please help i know i didnt explain it good but idk how else to say[/code]

Read full topic
